summary: Adds a new, unique two-handed hammer that can be obtained at the end of a small dungeon. Based on Sulfuras, The Extinguished Hand from World of Warcraft. Comes in 1k, 2k, 4k and 8k versions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkMFU4n.png[/img][/url] [/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/METqSay.jpg[/img][/center][b][center][color=#ffff00]
[youtube]4z3khqp2Dbk[/youtube] [youtube]JTso018yaTk[/youtube] [youtube]XlmMyXwLgp4[/youtube] [youtube]i9iR-S6Am4A[/youtube] [youtube]3uXDvAlty4E[/youtube][/color][/center][/b]
[b]About:[/b]

A long time ago, there was a lord of fire, that purged huge groups of adventurers from within his lair. He wielded the hammer Sulfuras, which intensified his strength. Fast forward to centuries later, the Dwemer stumbled upon this artifact whilst digging in the mountains around Sunderstone Gorge. Upon discovering Sulfuras, they sought to harness its power to further advance their technologies and bring warmth within their community. That is until the Thalmor heard about it and it's up to you to stop them!

Glow intensity is based upon your ENBseries preset and may differ in comparison to the screenshots. This comes in 1k, 2k, 4k and 8k resolutions.

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b] A small quest & dungeon, with a brand new weapon as the end reward. The weapon is stronger than Daedric, can be upgraded, sets enemies on fire and has a chance to disarm them.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Obtaining:[/b]

Go upstairs in Whiterun's "Bannered Mare" and find the note. All will be revealed! (Moltnkorr)

[color=#ff0000][b]If you can't find the Dropped Note in the Bannered Mare, go to Sunderstone Gorge (the area, not the dungeon) and enter Moltnkorr nearby![/b][/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the downloaded archive into your Skyrim Data Folder.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files:

Sulfuras The Reclaimed Hand - Johnskyrim.esp
Sulfuras The Reclaimed Hand - Johnskyrim.bsa

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Questions:[/b]

Q. What did you use to create this mod?
A. 3ds Max, Zbrush and Photoshop.

Q. Will you make a one-handed version?
A. No, that would defeat the purpose.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Known Issues:[/b]

- The quest that was going to made was left unimplemented. I'm not good at scripting for Skyrim yet and I couldn't figure out the problem.
- Small black oval in the texture. Nifskope and 3ds Max don't show this, so I don't know how to fix it. In a place that's away from the camera anyway :)
- Some texture seams

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod!

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center][color=yellow][b]Please check out my other mods![/b][/color]
